Tech Talk & Internship Info Session by NI
=========================================

by [ecepic](https://fke.utm.my/author/ecepic/ "Posts by ecepic")
 | Nov 12, 2017 | [ECE](https://fke.utm.my/category/ece/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/nintern-660x675.png)

NI will conducting a Tech Talk on _“Analog – Be Inspired_“, followed by an Internship @ NI Info Session this Tuesday, 14 Nov 2017 (Refer to figure below). Meanwhile on Wednesday, 15 Nov they will having an internship interview session starting from 8.00 am to 5.00 pm at P19a, Level 5, Tutorial Room 10. Don’t miss out this opportunity  by submitting your resume to [ni.com/penang/carreers](http://ni.com/penang/carreers)
 .

![nintern](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/nintern.png)
